name: ITR-E-19 Test Record for Insulation Resistance
ITR-I-11 Cone and Thread Pressure Testing
Tubing orientation as per hook up drawing.
Checked with a Torque Wrench and marked and tagged
Ensure Area is barricaded off to restrict unauthorized entry to personnel
Tube as per specification and hook up drawings.
Chart recorder used and attached (where applicable).
Confirm all Tubing lines have been pigged / cleaned.
Check all plugs are replaced (if removed), vents are closed, and isolation valves are in correct positions.
Ensure equipment is left clean and in a safe state for handover to operations to the standard of ITP-I-08 Cone and Thread cleaning procedure
All relevant signatures (Installed by, Approved by, Client Representative)
